Class AlbumController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AlbumController
public class AlbumController extends Object
Controller for the Album view. Manages displaying photos in an album and performing operations such as add, remove, copy, move, tag, and navigation.

Handles photo selection, preview, tagging and operations that move or copy photos between albums for the active user.

Author:
Zach
